name: ESP8266SmartPowerPlug

Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill for DIY people. You can creat your Smart Power Plug with ESP8266 by the tutorial "Alexa Echo + ESP8266 = Smart power plug" on here:
https://www.instructables.com/id/Alexa-Echo-ESP-8266-Smart-Power-Plug/
You must login with the domain/ip and password you installed in ESP8266 to use this skill
